bug.author: naveenjafer
bug.description: Hi, Could someone kindly add documentation on the API for the RANN package? <denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-2.2.3/doxygen.php?doc=classRASearch.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-2.2.3/doxygen.php?doc=classRASearch.html</denchmark-link> it is empty.

comments.comment:
Hello, this link is working for me: <denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-2.2.3/doxygen.php?doc=classmlpack_1_1neighbor_1_1RASearch.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-2.2.3/doxygen.php?doc=classmlpack_1_1neighbor_1_1RASearch.html</denchmark-link>
Can you tell us which link references to the one you mentioned?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zoq>@zoq</denchmark-link> clicking the API corresponding to RANN in this page <denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/about.html>http://www.mlpack.org/about.html</denchmark-link> leads to the link I had posted above, Maybe it is linking to some older link.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/naveenjafer>@naveenjafer</denchmark-link> thanks for the fast response, that helps a lot, we will fix that.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zoq>@zoq</denchmark-link> Thank you, WIll close the issue then :)
Actually, do you mind to let this open, as a reminder?

Sorry! I was working on this Friday, I thought I had everything patched back up by the time I left. I'll handle it when I get home this afternoon. I'll let you know when it is done and the doxygen output will look a lot nicer too. :)

Fixed. The correct link now is <denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-2.2.3/doxygen/classmlpack_1_1neighbor_1_1RASearch.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-2.2.3/doxygen/classmlpack_1_1neighbor_1_1RASearch.html</denchmark-link> , and I updated about.html to reflect that. Sorry for the inconvenience.
